Unusual process execution or command-lin.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation with command-line arguments containing paths to Outlook data files (.ost, .pst). Identify processes accessing these files that are not typical applications (e.g., outlook.exe, searchindexer.exe). Calculate frequency of processes accessing these files and identify rare or never-before-seen processes using statistical methods (e.g., frequency analysis, outlier detection).

Suspicious access, copying, or modificat.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4656 (Handle Operation - if auditing is configured for email file paths) or other relevant host logs for read/write/copy operations on files ending in .ost or .pst. Correlate file access events with suspicious processes identified in Windows Event ID 4688. Analyze access patterns over time using time series analysis to detect unusual spikes in file activity.
